trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: Unit test coverage > 80% (REQ-1-101); All unit tests pass; Linter passes; No critical vulnerabilities in SAST scan (Snyk/Trivy).
business_impact: Prevents basic errors and security flaws from entering the main codebase.

success_criteria: All critical path E2E smoke tests pass (e.g., User Login, Add to Cart, Initiate Order). Key API health checks return 200 OK.
failure_action: Automatically roll back the deployment. Trigger P2 alert.
escalation_procedure: On-call engineer and release manager are notified.
business_impact: Prevents broken builds from impacting the testing and UAT process.

trigger_event: Manual trigger before scheduled Production release
success_criteria: Full E2E regression suite passes with >98% success rate. Performance benchmark tests show no degradation >5% from baseline. All high-severity security vulnerabilities are remediated. Manual UAT sign-off received.
failure_action: Halt the production release. Convene a go/no-go meeting.
escalation_procedure: Release is blocked and reported to stakeholders.
business_impact: Final quality checkpoint to prevent major defects from reaching production.
